alert.note: Alert for Blount; Knox; Loudon; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:26PM CDT until June 11 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Loudon County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Knox County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Blount County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Loudon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Oak Ridge, Lenoir City, Alcoa, Kingston, Loudon, Farragut, Louisville, Rockford and Eagleton Village. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 356 and 390. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 70 and 109. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
